alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 7:48PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mecklenburg, southern Lunenburg and northwestern Brunswick Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 748 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kells Corner, or 9 miles east of Chase City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kenbridge, Alberta, Rehoboth, Dundas, Gary, Bacons Fork, Cochran, Wilburn, Gills Corner, Loves Mill, Barrows Store, North View, Meredithville, Lafoon Corner, Danieltown, Oral Oaks, Wightman and Prices Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.
